items.title: Awesome Ocaml
items.content_text:
### Language-related

*   [OCaml Style Guide (by Jane Street)](https://opensource.janestreet.com/standards/) - See also: [\[1\]](https://www.seas.upenn.edu/~cis500/cis500-f06/resources/programming_style.html), [\[2\]](http://www.cs.cornell.edu/Courses/cs312/2001sp/style.html), [\[3\]](https://www.seas.upenn.edu/~cis120/20fa/ocaml_style/).
*   [A safe but strange way of modifying OCaml compiler](https://camlspotter.blogspot.com/2012/09/a-safe-but-strange-way-of-modifying.html)
items.content_html:
Language-related

  • OCaml Style Guide (by Jane Street) - See also: [1], [2], [3].
  • A safe but strange way of modifying OCaml compiler

items.title: Awesome Smart Tv
items.content_text:
### Samsung Tizen / Other

*   [Identification of Samsung TV models 2008-2017](http://en.tab-tv.com/?page_id=7123) - How to get screen size, matrix type, year of development, series and other parameters from Samsung TV model name.
items.content_html:
Samsung Tizen / Other

  • Identification of Samsung TV models 2008-2017 - How to get screen size, matrix type, year of development, series and other parameters from Samsung TV model name.

items.title: Awesome Mac
items.content_text:
### Developer Tools / Databases

*   [Chrome MySQL Admin (‚≠ê141)](https://github.com/yoichiro/chrome_mysql_admin) - Powerful Chrome app to manage your MySQL. [![Open-Source Software](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-oss.svg "Open Source Software") ![Freeware](https://jaywcjlove.github.io/sb/ico/min-free.svg "Freeware")](https://github.com/yoichiro/chrome_mysql_admin)
items.content_html:
Developer Tools / Databases

  • Chrome MySQL Admin (‚≠ê141) - Powerful Chrome app to manage your MySQL.

items.title: Awesome R Learning Resources
items.content_text:
### Blogs / Uncategorized

*   [Alex Cookson](https://www.alexcookson.com/) - Alex Cookson loves making beautiful visualizations and easy-to-read walkthroughs of R concepts. He's particularly interested in data about media, like books, movies, and musicals.
items.content_html:
Blogs / Uncategorized

  • Alex Cookson - Alex Cookson loves making beautiful visualizations and easy-to-read walkthroughs of R concepts. He's particularly interested in data about media, like books, movies, and musicals.

items.title: Awesome Recursion Schemes
items.content_text:
### Articles

*   [Promorphisms, Pre and Post](https://jtobin.io/promorphisms-pre-post) - Practical examples of pre- and postpromorphisms by Jared Tobin.
items.content_html:
Articles

  • Promorphisms, Pre and Post - Practical examples of pre- and postpromorphisms by Jared Tobin.

items.title: Awesome Ros2
items.content_text:
### Packages / Ecosystem

*   [LGSVL](https://www.lgsvlsimulator.com/) - Simulation software to accelerate safe autonomous vehicle development.
*   [Unity Robotics Hub (‚≠ê2.3k)](https://github.com/Unity-Technologies/Unity-Robotics-Hub) - This is a central repository for tools, tutorials, resources, and documentation for robotic simulation in Unity.

### Organizations / Robotics Capture the Flag (RCTF)

*   [U.S. Department of Transportation](https://discourse.ros.org/t/carma-migrating-to-ros-2-with-cyclonedds-and-zenoh/17541)
items.content_html:
Packages / Ecosystem

  • LGSVL - Simulation software to accelerate safe autonomous vehicle development.
  • Unity Robotics Hub (‚≠ê2.3k) - This is a central repository for tools, tutorials, resources, and documentation for robotic simulation in Unity.

Organizations / Robotics Capture the Flag (RCTF)

  • U.S. Department of Transportation

items.title: Awesome Gbdev
items.content_text:
### Compilers / Experimental/Proof of Concepts

*   [gbdk-go (‚≠ê23)](https://github.com/pokemium/gbdk-go) - A compiler translates Go programs to C code. The output C code is built into GB ROM by GBDK.
items.content_html:
Compilers / Experimental/Proof of Concepts

  • gbdk-go (‚≠ê23) - A compiler translates Go programs to C code. The output C code is built into GB ROM by GBDK.
